text: Sana Ögeday'ın ordusunda şan, şöhret, altın vaat ederim.

text: (Noyan) Avratların en güzelini, atların en hızlılarını...
english: (Noyan) The most beautiful of women, the fastest of horses...

text: Sana cihanı fethedecek en büyük ordunun şanlı bir komutanı olmanı teklif ederim.
english: you the opportunity to become the glorious commander of the greatest army that will conquer the world .
of them want to see the danger Noyan poses.

text: Hayme Ana ve Gündoğdu ne der beyim?
english: What will Hayme Ana and Gündoğdu say, my lord?
I'll convince my older brother and my mother.
But we mustn't lose a single person at the wedding.
What are we going to do, sir?

text: Bütün toy beyleriyle bir bir görüşün.
english: Meet with each of the young lords individually. Explain to

text: Herkese neden alpbaşı olmak istediğimi iyice anlatın.
english: everyone clearly why I want to be the Alpbaşı (leader of the warriors) .

text: Makamda gözüm olmadığını onlara iyice izah edin.
english: Make it very clear to them that I have no interest in a position of power. If
we attack before Noyan attacks us...
Otherwise, Noyan will leave no stone unturned...
I'm going to send you to Noyan's place to spy.
We will ask Geyikli for help with this.

text: Lakin toydaki şu işi halletmemiz lazım.
english: But we need to sort out this matter at the wedding.
Otherwise, all our plans will fall through.
(Noyan) Your horse is ready with its weapons , waiting for you.
(Noyan) You are free to leave whenever you want.
Your death is of no use to me, Hamza.
On the contrary, I would be extremely upset.

text: (Noyan) Teklifimin kıymetini idrak edecek kadar zekisin.
english: (Noyan) You're intelligent enough to understand the value of my offer.

text: (Noyan) İkimiz de gidecek yerin olmadığını biliriz.
english: (Noyan) We both know we have nowhere to go.

text: Üstelik, yüreğini kemiren bir kinin vardır.
english: Moreover, he harbors a gnawing hatred in his heart.

text: (Noyan) Ömrünü uğruna defalarca feda ettiğin beyinden nefret edersin.
english: (Noyan) You hate the very brain for which you sacrificed your life countless times .

text: Sana Gündoğdu'nun yaptığı alçaklığın intikamını alma fırsatı da veririm.
english: I will also give you the opportunity to take revenge for the despicable act Gündoğdu committed.

text: Karar senin. İstersen bu gece misafirim ol.
english: The choice is yours. You can be my guest tonight, if you like.

text: Düşün. Sabah sakin kafayla oturur, konuşuruz.
english: Think. We'll sit down and talk calmly in the morning .
You will serve him until he leaves.
you. You were like this when

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im sizi bana getirdiğinde siz de böyleydiniz.
english: Ertuğrul Bey brought you to me . Just

text: Onun kadar vahşi, onun kadar cesur, bir o kadar da baş belası.

text: Tuğtekin de Gündoğdu da beylerle konuşur.

strange that they don't meet with you? It's
They know my beliefs won't change.

text: Şimdi ikisi bir olup beyimizin başını yiyecekler.
english: Now these two are going to team up and get rid of our lord.
(Deli Demir) In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

text: Gökçe maharetli kız. Yakışmış sana da.
english: Gökçe is a talented girl. It suits you too.

text: Ben de tahmin etmiyordum bu kadar iyi bir iş çıkartacağını.
english: I didn't expect him to do such a good job either.

text: Tuğtekin, gözlerin başka bakar Gökçe'ye. Babanla konuşurum istersen.
english: Tuğtekin, your eyes look at Gökçe differently. I can talk to your father if you want.

text: Şu Ertuğrul meselesini halledeyim, ondan sonra konuşuruz.
english: Let me sort out this Ertuğrul matter first, then we'll talk. Alright.

text: Ne yaptınız? Konuştunuz mu beylerle? Ne derler?
english: What did you do? Have you spoken to the gentlemen? What do they say?

text: Alpler Ertuğrul Bey'i istiyor. Hayme Ana ne yapacağını bilemez halde.
english: The Alps want Ertuğrul Bey. Hayme Ana doesn't know what to do.
Crazy Demir, as you know. What about
I suspect Artuk Bey. He would rather die than reveal a

Ertuğrul doesn't want to give up his position as chief commander.

english: only one thing left to do in this situation.
take away Ertuğrul's title of Alp...
...we will have solved the whole problem.
(Halime) The mother won't stop until she kills Noyan.
It's impossible for him to hold a sword with his bare hands.
What happened to your hand? That

text: Noyan denilen pislik eline çivi çakmış.
english: scumbag Noyan has driven a nail into his hand.
What good is a soldier without weapons?

text: Artuk Bey'e elini gösterecekmiş. Sonra başka birini görecekmiş.
english: He was going to show his hand to Artuk Bey. Then she was going to see someone else.
He didn't say where he was going.
The gentlemen at the gathering will make the decision.

I am opening the wedding. Here you go.

text: Toydan ne karar çıkarsa çıksın, obalara huzur gelmeyeceği belli Halime.
english: Whatever decision comes out of the wedding, it's clear that peace won't come to the villages, Halime. Just make sure

text: Yeter ki anamla sen Ertuğrul Bey'imle ters düşmeyesin ha.
english: you and my mother don't fall out with Ertuğrul Bey.
I said bad things to her, Selcan.

text: Karnımda bebem bu gerçeği görmeme engel oldu.
english: My baby in my belly prevented me from seeing this reality.
Why do you say that, Halime?

text: ...bu haliyle oğlunun ölüme meydan okumasına razı gelmeyecektir.
english: ...would not allow her son to defy death in this state . In

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im obası için her şeyi yapacak kadar basiretlidir.
english: Ertuğrul Bey is wise enough to do anything for his tribe.

text: Bunu bilir, buna inanırım. Lakin nihayetinde insandır.
english: I know this, I believe this. But ultimately, they are human.
After the decision made at the wedding...
...take care of your husband, Halime Sultan. Let's not make

text: Bir yanlışa saplanıp da hepimizin başını belaya sokmasın.
english: a mistake and get us all into trouble . You try to cast

text: Onu en müşkül gününde kenara atmaya çalışırsınız.
english: him aside on his most difficult day .

text: Peki ya sizin başınız belaya düştüğünde ne edeceksiniz?
english: So what will you do when you get into trouble?

text: Dua edin ki Ertuğrul Bey o gün yanınızda olsun.
english: Pray that Ertuğrul Bey will be with you that day.
(Music - Thriller) It is a known story that

text: ...bütün ahaliyi önüne katarak, erkek, kadın, çoluk çocuk demeden...
english: ...and rounded up all the inhabitants, beheading everyone, men, women, and children alike.

text: İlk önce bu korkuya mani olmalıyız.
english: First, we must overcome this fear.

text: Bütün kış oturup savaşı beklemek, ölmeden mezara girip...
english: Sitting around all winter waiting for war
is no different than entering a grave before dying and waiting for death. Spit it out!

text: Noyan itine kemik yetiştiren ahalinin korkusuna mani olmalıyız.
english: We must prevent the fear of the people who are raising bones for that dog Noyan.
We must give them hope so that...
...these dogs can't come and take their bones. We must prevent

text: Moğol ordusunu doyuran tüccarın altına tamah etmesine engel olmalıyız.
english: the merchant who fed the Mongol army from becoming greedy for gold.

text: Olmalıyız ki altın alan elinin bizim tarafımızdan kesileceğini bilsin.
english: We must ensure that whoever takes gold knows that their hand will be cut off by us.

text: Bundan gayrı savunmada kalacak, düşmanı bekleyecek vaktimiz yoktur.
english: From now on, we have no time to remain on the defensive and wait for the enemy. We will

text: Noyan itine saldırıp onu bunaltacağız ki...
english: attack that dog Noyan and overwhelm him so that he knows...
...his army cannot remain in these parts . And what

text: ...Noyan itini bunaltıp, savaşamaz hale getirmek için...
english: ...to overwhelm that dog Noyan and render him incapable of fighting... ...I demand the return of the task given to me by

text: Daha ne kadar sürecek bu toy? Bitmek bilmedi.
english: How much longer will this party last? It never ended.

text: Beyimiz onların perde inen gözlerini açmıştır muhakkak.
english: Our leader has surely opened their eyes, which had been veiled. Ertuğrul Bey is the one

text: Aramızda Moğolları en iyi tanıyan Ertuğrul Bey'im.
english: among us who knows the Mongols best .
Because he penetrated right into their dens.

text: Er geç bunu toydakiler de anlayacak.
english: Even those at the wedding will understand this sooner or later. That

text: İşte o zaman Ertuğrul Bey'im yeniden Alplerin başına geçecek.
english: 's when Ertuğrul Bey will once again lead the Alps.
(Turgut) Don't worry. The truth shines brightly

text: (Adam) Ertuğrul Bey'in sözlerinde hakikat ışıl ışıl parlamakta.
Lakin bu iş nasıl olacak bilemedim.
english: But I didn't know how this was going to work. Preventing merchants from

text: Noyan'ın askerlerini besleyen tüccarlara engel olmak...
...civardaki köylere destek vermek, casusların izini sürmek.
english: ...providing support to nearby villages, tracking down spies.
These things are not easy at all.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'in sözleri beni de etkiledi. Doğru der.
english: Ertuğrul Bey's words affected me too. He's right. What

text: Ya zayıf bir anımızda bu Noyan iti bize yine saldırır...
english: if, in a moment of weakness, this dog Noyan attacks us again...
...slaughters our women, our children, our Alps...

text: ...hayvanlarımızı telef ederse, o vakit ne yapacağız?
english: ...kills our animals , what will we do then? We

text: Savaştayız abi. Gerekli tedbirleri almak zorundayız.
english: 're at war, man. We have to take the necessary precautions.

text: Sen ne tedbirinden bahsedersin Ertuğrul Bey?
english: What kind of precaution are you talking about, Ertuğrul Bey?

text: Bir Alp'in canı, kılıç tutan elidir.
english: A warrior's lifeblood is the hand that holds the sword.
You've already lost your hand to Noyan.

text: Daha kılıç tutamayan bir Alpin, Alplere komuta etmesi nerede görüldü?
english: Where has it ever been seen that an Alpine warrior who can barely hold a sword commands the Alps?
What do you say, Tugtekin? Do
you even hear what comes out of your own mouth?

text: Onu bana değil, Artuk Bey'e sorun beyim.
english: Ask Artuk Bey, not me, sir.

text: Doğrudur beyim. Çivi çakıldığında eli çok zarar görmüştür.
english: 's correct, sir. His hand was severely injured when the nail was hammered in .
(Artuk) I don't know if it will get better or not.

text: Lakin kış bitip de savaşa gidinceye kadar...
english: But it's clear that things won't improve until winter is over and we go to war...
Selcan fit inside this? Of course it

text: Bir hinlik yapmazlarsa babasının verdiğini ondan alamazlar.
english: Unless they play a trick, they cannot take back what his father gave them. I don't know

text: Hangisi daha hayırlı bilemez oldum Selcan.

english: (Scary) We listened to everyone until the end.

text: Artık beylerin kararını görmek gerekir Hayme bacım.
english: Now we need to see the gentlemen's decision, Hayme sister.
The time is right now, sir.

text: O halde Alplerimiz arasında ikilik çıkmaması için...
english: Therefore, in order to prevent discord among our Alps...
...I vote that Tugtekin should command the Alps... ...and that
removed from the ranks of the Alps until he recovers.
